title: View current on-call status
content:
The On-Call Schedule Management feature allows you to easily view the on-call shifts, working hours, and vacations of you, and any employees you manage. In addition, you can view the current on-call assignment of any group.

To view the current on-call assignment of any group:

  1. From the Main menu, select Run > On-Call Schedule.
  2. Select the group. The right panel displays these sections:
    • Current members who are on call. Note that if a member is on vacation, they still appear under On-call right now during the shift. This is a known limitation.
    • Group members.

To view your current on-call status:

  1. Click the avatar in the menu bar and then select User profile. The Profile & Preferences page is displayed.

  2. Do one of the following:

    • Click Schedule in the main menu bar.

    • Click View calendar at the top left of the page.

    Your schedule is displayed.

To view the current on-call status of a group of which you are a member:

  1. Click the avatar in the menu bar and then select User profile. The Profile & Preferences page is displayed.
  2. Select the group.
  3. Click the calendar icon. The group schedule is displayed.

To view the current on-call status of an employee:

  1. Click the avatar in the menu bar and then select User profile. The Profile & Preferences page is displayed.
  2. Click the calendar icon for the employee. The employee schedule is displayed.

You can also view the employee schedule by using the View a different schedule link on the top left of the page. This link is displayed when viewing your own schedule. Click the link to display a drop-down, and select the employee. The employee schedule is displayed.
